abstract: The decision to postpone the plan, called Browse, comes as prices for the fuel in Asia have fallen steeply.
snippet: The decision to postpone the plan, called Browse, comes as prices for the fuel in Asia have fallen steeply.
lead_paragraph: Woodside Petroleum and its partners, including the energy giants Royal Dutch Shell and BP, have decided to delay indefinitely the development of a huge liquefied natural gas project off Western Australia, the company said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Australian Energy Giant Woodside Delays Large Offshore L.N.G. Project
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Woodside Petroleum to Delay L.N.G. Project Off Australia
